meanings.definition: More stylish or neat in dress or appearance.
meanings.sent1: He felt dapperer than ever in his new suit.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman looked even dapperer with his polished shoes.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to look dapperer by wearing a tiny bowtie.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as dapperer as a freshly pressed shirt.
meanings.sent5: The garden was dapperer than a well-tailored jacket after the flowers bloomed.

meanings.definition: More attractive or appealing in a refined way.
meanings.sent1: The painting appeared dapperer with the new frame.
meanings.sent2: She felt dapperer when she put on her favorite earrings.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked dapperer with the elegant frosting design.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as dapperer as a melody from a grand piano.
meanings.sent5: The sunset was dapperer than a painting by a famous artist.
